Articles.Content:
Hello,

Since the 1.0 update I've been encountering random hanging. There doesn't appear to be any pattern to it, the game just hangs for around 20-30 seconds then comes back. Whilst my pc is fairly old, I've never encountered this sort of issue before - anyone experiencing the same problem or have any ideas?

Thanks
Please see the support stickies Bertie, we'll need the logs from your game

Yeah read them after I made this post but couldn't change it as it hadn't been approved yet, then found a similar thread anyway!

www.bassettmatthew.webspace.virginmedia.com/output_log.zip
